document.full_text: video conferencing services developed by huawei and zte will shake up the market in coming years in the same way the chinese vendors changed the telecom gear sector, research firm ovum said on thursday.
document.title: huawei, zte to shake up video conferencing: ovum
lines_and_colors: video conferencing services developed by huawei and zte will shake up the market in coming years in the same way the chinese vendors changed the telecom gear sector, research firm ovum said on thursday.
